string.text: {=PRev0001}You looted a nearby village. They now demand to cut someone's head off. How are you going to respond?[rf:idle_angry][ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
{=PRev0002}Just curious, the {PEASANTREVENGER.LINK} say that you looted your own village earlier. The peasants want your head off. How are you going to respond?[if:convo_thinking][if:idle_happy]
{=PRev0007}Are you sure it was as you say?[if:convo_thinking][ib:closed]
{=PRev0010}Well, maybe it is not for peasants to decide your fate...[if:convo_thinking]
{=PRev0014}Your prisoner {CRIMINAL.LINK} looted our village. We demand to impale their head on a spike![if:convo_furious][ib:aggressive]
{=PRev0017}No, it is not your business. Peasant!

{=PRev0021}{PARTYLEADER.LINK} caught {CRIMINAL.LINK} looting our village. We demand the criminal's head to be impaled on a spike. This bastard must pay for their crime in blood![ib:aggressive][if:convo_furious]
{=PRev0022}I will not bow to some peasants demands! And {HERO.NAME} shouldn't either!
{=PRev0023}I won't pay! The criminal {CVICTIM.NAME} will die!
{=PRev0028}At last! The criminal will die for their sins.[ib:closed][if:happy]
{=PRev0030}See that? Our prisoner was just killed by a peasant![ib:convo_bared_teeth][if:convo_shocked][if:convo_astonished]
{=PRev0032}You won't get a thing out of me!
{=PRev0034}The captive is dead! About time you join them.
{=PRev0040}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} after {SAVER.NAME} paid {REPARATION}{GOLD_ICON} in reparation.
{=PRev0041}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} after {PRISONER.NAME} paid {REPARATION}{GOLD_ICON} in reparation
{=PRev0042}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} to avoid a cross-border incident with another kingdom
{=PRev0043}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} after {SAVER.NAME} executed the notable peasant {EXECUTIONER.NAME}
{=PRev0044}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} in honor of their friendship
{=PRev0047}{SETTLEMENTOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} in honor of their friendship
{=PRev0048}Will you deal with the criminals in this village?
{=PRev0050}Your criminal intentions are well known to me.
{=PRev0051}I can try to teach you by example.
{=PRev0052}Here take {BRIBEVALUE}{GOLD_ICON}. Make them pay for their crimes!
{=PRev0054}They can do what they want. It is not my business to interfere.[ib:closed][if:angry]
{=PRev0056}{SETTLEMENTOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} in honor of their good relationship
{=PRev0057}{SETTLEMENTOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} in honor of their family bonds.
{=PRev0058}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} in honor of their good relationship
{=PRev0059}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} in honor of their family bonds
{=PRev0065}I have friends who will pay the reparation.
{=PRev0068}{PARTYLEADER.LINK} caught {CRIMINAL.LINK} looting our village, and {CVICTIM.LINK} has been accused of planning all of it. We demand justice![ib:aggressive][if:convo_furious]
{=PRev0069}{CRIMINAL.NAME} accused the {CRIMINALBLAMED.NAME} for looting the village.
{=PRev0071}What does the criminal say about it?
{=PRev0078}I do not have time to talk right now.[rf:idle_angry][ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
{=PRev0079}Let me tell you how to talk to me about your problems.
{=PRev0081}You should not immediately interrupt me with any of your matters.
{=PRev0082}You should immediately interrupt me with any of your matters.
{=PRev0090}Disable the option to defend the village against neutral mobile parties
{=PRev0091}Enable the option to defend the village against neutral mobile parties
{=PRev0092}I will defend villages from any looters.
{=PRev0093}I will defend villages from my enemies only.
{=PRev0095}There is something I'd like to discuss.
{=PRev0103}{PARTYOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} due to conflicting accusations.
{=PRev0104}{SETTLEMENTOWNER.NAME} decided not to execute {PRISONER.NAME} due to conflicting accusations.
{=PRev0107}You should drop your revenge, or else...
{=PRev0111}{CRIMINAL.NAME} and {CVICTIM.LINK} are dead! My revenge has been achieved![if:happy]
{=PRev0114}Nobody can stop me from taking revenge on {CRIMINAL.LINK}![rf:idle_angry][if:convo_furious][ib:angry]
{=PRev0118}Here take {BRIBEVALUE}{GOLD_ICON}. These noble people are not the criminals you are looking for.
{=PRev0120}They are breaking the law and will rightfully face the consequences of their actions.[ib:closed][if:angry]
{=PRev0122}Your bribe will not work. Be more patient.
{=PRev0123}The Peasant's traits do not allow for bribes.
{=PRev0127}Justice demands you pay for your crimes.
{=PRev0132}No one should be afraid of these criminals.
{=PRev0133}Someone must be held accountable for the destruction of our village!
{=PRev0136}Pity for your enemy is cruelty onto your ally.
{=PRev0137}Let the nobles take care of the judgement. You are not important enough.
{=PRev0138}Everyone has heard of your hostile speeches against nobles.
{=PRev0139}Your kindness to the enemy is harmful enough to consider it criminal.
{=PRev0142}Do not expect me to change my ways.
{=PRev0144}Great question! Let me demonstrate with an example...
